name: Sites Spacer
description: This block represents a spacer allowing to add extra empty space between blocks.

elements.helpText: This element controls the background for this spacer.
elements.label: Background

elements.helpText: This element controls the height of this spacer in pixels.
elements.label: Spacer height

elements.helpText: This element controls the common settings for this block.
elements.label: Common Settings

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
